value:
Anna wants to master painting eggs
for the spring festival. No doubt
she wants to sell them.

We were right in the middle of
celebrating the arrival of spring
when I was summoned.$k$pHad I known I would be plucked
from our castle like that, I would
have come...better prepared.

On patrol, $Nu?$k$pI know that this time of year can put
a spring in our steps. Just remember
that if you get tired, I'll take my turn.

We have a custom of painting eggs
during our spring festival. But I have
a habit of crushing the eggs I make.

I have to take special care with my,
er, weapon here. It chips easily.
Hmm...I miss Falchion.

Greetings from $Nf.$k$pDo you enjoy the spring season,
$Nu? I do!

Ha! The spirit of spring moves
through me.

In the spirit of spring, I will
grow stronger!

I'm not living up to the whole
idea of spring growth here.

Whatever you did there is making
this costume fit me better!

I'm Chrom, Prince of the Halidom of
Ylisse. Enjoying the spring festival?
I've dressed for the occasion!

Ah, if it isn't $Nu!$k$pI just finished painting some
spring-festival eggs. Not bad, if
I say so myself. Take a look.$k$pWhat? Curious what all that
lettering is? It's written in the
language of Ylisse.$k$pIt's a bit of a poem, I guess, that
says how much I value your
presence here.$k$pAnd see? On this side, I've painted
a picture of you. Good likeness,
don't you think?$k$pWhat, it isn't? Well, I tried, and at
least now you know that I truly
do value our strong bond.$k$pNow, may we spend many spring
festivals together and...I promise
to work on my painting skills.
せいっ
やあっ
おわっ！
What's the idea?!
Spring's in bloom!
Spring gives me strength!
You will not stop my festivity!
I say when winter's over!
It's over.
Haha
Spring inspires me to give my all.
My trusty Falchion has been replaced by...this.
Those in my group, the Shepherds, tell me to wear more dashing outfits. This dashing enough?
Eggs and rabbits have been symbols of the spring festival for ages.
I heard my sister Lissa hid eggs all over Ylisse. What a quest I'll have in store when I go home.
I'll stand out in battle going out dressed like this!
That we met in the spring must be important. I hope it means our bond will grow ever stronger.
All right.
Spring has sprung.
What a season!
